name: VenomX-Userbot
description: [VenomX-Userbot] is a Telegram userbot running on Python3 with the Pyrogram Library.

API_ID.description: Get API ID on the web my.telegram.org Enter the Telegram API ID

API_HASH.description: Get Hash API on the web my.telegram.org

STRING_SESSION1.description: Get String Session Pyrogram in Group » https://t.me/Venom_Chatz» Then type #string

BOTLOG_CHATID.description: Create a public telegram group then enter @MissRose_bot type /id, enter the group ID here. example: -1001473548xxx

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Get your Heroku API KEY here » https://dashboard.heroku.com/account

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Enter the Heroku App Name, the first App Name to be filled in (see top)
